sentences.english: If the detection is suddenly sexual bald-headed, please seek dermatologist.
sentences.chinese: 如果发现突然性的秃发，请去找皮肤科医生。

sentences.english: Objective To observe the therapeutic effect of hair autotransplantation.
sentences.chinese: 目的观察自体显微毛发移植治疗永久性秃发的效果。

sentences.english: If you find a sudden bald spot, see your dermatologist.
sentences.chinese: 如果发现突然性的秃发，请去找皮肤科医生。

sentences.english: Objective To discuss effective nursing procedure in scalp expanding to treat scar baldness.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨用头皮扩张法治疗瘢痕性秃发的护理措施。

sentences.english: You may have Alopecia Areata, which occurs when your  immune system starts attacking the hair bulbs.
sentences.chinese: 当免疫系统开始攻击毛球，你可能出现秃发现象。

sentences.english: When the immune system starts attackstoning hair ball, you probably appear a bald-headed phenomenon.
sentences.chinese: 当免疫系统开始攻击毛球，你可能出现秃发现象。

sentences.english: That is the commonest fatal hereditary disease.
sentences.chinese: 在你的家族里，秃发是遗传性的吗？

definition: baldness/to lose hair or feathers/to molt/depilation
Xianbei or Xianbi, group of northern nomadic peoples
Xianbei or Xianbi, historic ethnic group of northern nomads
